title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project is not.
EB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Go to the Navigator.
3. Select both P1 and P2.
4. Observe that the Close Project menu item is not available.
